content: these will help front you later when you pick up sts for the beginning at the cast on edge and starting front from the first st on your needle at the right shoulder with rs facing pu count 25 32 33 38 43 48 52 57 62 and k 25 32 33 38 43 48 52 57 62 sts sts place a removable marker on the co remove the first neck marker and using edge of this st from this marker count a backwards loop cast on 42 44 46 48 50 further 42 44 46 48 50 52 52 54 56 52 52 54 56 sts starting from the sts and place the second removable second neck marker pu and k 25 32 33 marker on the cast on edge of this st 38 43 48 52 57 62 sts for the left beginning with a rs row work flat in shoulder stockinette stitch for 1 2 5cm ending on work flat in stockinette stitch for 1 a ws row 2 5cm ending on a ws row using german short row see pg 5 for a using german short row begin short link to a video tutorial begin short row row shoulder shaping for the front as shoulder shaping for the back as follows follows row 1 k to 2 3 3 3 4 5 5 6 6 sts from row 1 k to 2 3 3 3 4 5 5 6 6 sts from end turn and make ds end turn and make ds row 2 p to 2 3 3 3 4 5 5 6 6 sts from row 2 p to 2 3 3 3 4 5 5 6 6 sts from end turn and make ds end turn and make ds row 3 k to 2 3 3 3 4 5 5 6 6 from ds row 3 k to 2 3 3 3 4 5 5 6 6 from ds turn and make ds turn and make ds row 4 p to 2 3 3 3 4 5 5 6 6 sts from row 4 p to 2 3 3 3 4 5 5 6 6 sts from ds turn and make ds ds turn and make ds repeat row 3 and 4 six times more repeat row 3 and 4 six times more on the next rs row k across to end of row on the next rs row k across to end of row resolving each ds as you come to them resolving each ds as you come to them on the following ws row purl to end of on the following ws row purl to end row resolving the rest of the ds resolving the rest of the ds 3 continue to knit until front measures 7 knit until body measures 9 75 25 cm 7 5 8 8 75 9 25 9 75 10 5 11 11 25 / from underarm or until 1 25 3cm from 17 5 19
